lang.response.enabled.message: Responses are now enabled! To disable them, use: !mute

timesystem.add.error.negative.message: You can not give negative time.

timesystem.autolevel.chat.disabled.message: Auto level chat announcements are now disabled.

timesystem.autolevel.chat.enabled.message: Auto level chat announcements are now enabled!

timesystem.autolevel.disabled.message: Users will no longer be promoted to $1 when they have been in the chat for $2 hour(s).

timesystem.autolevel.enabled.message: Users will now be promoted to $1 when they have been in the chat for $2 hour(s).

timesystem.autolevel.promoted.message: $1 has been promoted to $2 by being in the chat for $3 hour(s). Congratulations!

timesystem.get.self.message: you currently have spent $2 in the chat.

timesystem.modpermtoggle.success.message: Users in the group $1 or higher are now able to use time management commands.

timesystem.offlinetime.disabled.message: Offline time will no longer be counted towards the time earned in chat.

timesystem.offlinetime.enabled.message: Offline time will now be counted towards the time earned in chat.

timesystem.set.promotehours.error.negati.message: You can not set the time in hours to promote a user to $1 to a negative number.

timesystem.set.promotehours.success.message: Set the time in hours to promote a user to $1 to $2.

timesystem.set.timezone.invalid.message: "$1" is not a valid time zone. A list of time zones can be found on "http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones".

timesystem.set.timezone.success.message: The time zone has been set to "$1". Automatically adjusts for daylight saving time: $2

timesystem.settime.error.negative.message: You can not set a balance to negative time.

timesystem.settime.success.message: Set the time balance of $1 to $2.

timesystem.streamertime.message: It is currently $1 where $2 is located.

timesystem.take.error.toomuch.message: You can not take more than what $1 has in time.
